entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 06:39 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 06:39 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
